forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. South southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms before 7pm, then a slight chance of thunderstorms and a slight chance of rain between 7pm and 8pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 58, with temperatures rising to around 60 overnight. Southwest wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 8am. Partly sunny. High near 73, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. East southeast wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain. Cloudy. High near 38, with temperatures falling to around 35 in the afternoon. East wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8pm, then rain and a chance of thunderstorms between 8pm and 4am, then freezing rain and rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy. Low around 29, with temperatures rising to around 32 overnight. East wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs with over a foot of snow since Thursday. Upper loops powertilled and tracked again Monday AM. Mid-winter type conditions should continue through the weekend.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed on Tuesday morning. Expect firm snow in the morning that will transition to softer snow late in the day.
nubsNob.comments: The wet snow from yesterday has firmed up overnight. Expect hard snow this morning that will soften around noon. The best skiing this morning is back on Pintail Peak as that was groomed last. The wind is up from the East today. Coverage on all of our snowmaking runs continues to be very good. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
